findings.message: No strict cache controls (add `no-store, private` for sensitive responses).
Wildcard ACAO detected. Consider restricting origins.
Advertised allowed methods: GET, OPTIONS, HEAD
No evidence of throttling headers or 429 under burst (30 req). Consider rate limits.

notes: Mapped to OWASP API Top 10 (2023): BOLA/IDOR, Broken Auth, Excessive Data Exposure, Lack of Rate Limiting, Mass Assignment, Improper Inventory, etc.
